name: podfetch
tagline: A self-hosted podcast downloader and sync server
description: PodFetch is a self-hosted podcast downloader and sync server that manages RSS feeds, handles episodes storage, and provides a web interface for browsing and downloading.

features.title: Podcast Downloads
features.description: Automatically download episodes from subscribed podcast RSS feeds

features.title: Rss Feed Management
features.description: Subscribe to and manage multiple podcast feeds from one interface

features.title: Episode Storage
features.description: Store downloaded episodes with organized file structure for easy access

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse podcasts and episodes through a clean web-based UI

features.title: Download Scheduling
features.description: Configure when and how often to check for new episodes

features.title: Storage Management
features.description: Set storage limits and automatically delete old episodes to save space

features.title: Episode Filtering
features.description: Configure rules to download only specific episodes based on criteria
